etymology.description: Semantic: 辶(辶) (chuò, "walk") + Phonetic: 冓(冓) (gòu, "assemble") -> meet; encounter
etymology.interpretation: The character 遘 combines the semantic element 辶(辶) (chuò, "walk") indicating movement or walking, with the phonetic element 冓(冓) (gòu, "assemble") to express the concept of meeting or encountering someone or something while moving.
